General_Description: '''Lying On Your Resume''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra answered the call of a mercenary.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra approached a civillian.
*'''Kassandra:''' Chaire''. Can I help you with anything?''
*'''[[Mercenary]]:''' ''I have a problem... I may have stretched the truth a bit to secure a mercenary contract... It might be a bit bigger job than I'm used to, if I'm honest.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''How ''much'' did you stretch the truth?''
*'''Mercenary:''' ''I told the [[Sparta]]n commander I have sunk whole fleets of [[ship]]s before. So he sent me after the [[piracy|pirates]] in the area... and the [[Athens|Athenians]].''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You haven't ever sunk a ship, have you?''
*'''Mercenary:''' ''I sank one, once. But it was mine. And I was in it.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So I have to sink the Athenian fleet.''
*'''Mercenary:''' ''You read me like an oracle.''
<tabber>
|-|I'll destroy them.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll take care of it.''
*'''Woman:''' ''I owe you one.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I should get going.''
|-|Find another misthios.=
TBA
</tabber>
Kassandra proceeded to board the [[Adrestia]] and sink five Athenian ships, returning to the mercenary shortly after.
*'''Mercenary:''' ''Back already. Did you destroy them all?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It would be back to piece them back together.''
*'''Mercenary:''' ''Payment well earned, mercenary. Take this as thanks.''
The mercenary hendled her a bag of [[drachma]]e.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Happy to help.''
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
